metadata.title: CVE-2022-0156 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: vim is vulnerable to Use After Free

notes.note: ccdm94> patches 8.2.4040 and 8.2.4042 are both needed (as defined by upstream). This patch makes changes to the code introduced by the patch for CVE-2021-4173.

criterions.comment: vim package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
